data_table.description: Stroke/TIA Subtype for All Cohorts (Corresponding to Survival File), Original, Offspring, Generation 3, and New Offspring Spouse Cohorts, reviewed through 2012. This dataset is to be used with the Neurological endpoints located in the dataset: vr_survcvd1_2012_a_0870. Classification criteria correspond to TOAST Criteria.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: STROKETIADATE
variable.comment: STROKETIADATE is formatted MMDDYYYY. For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.
